====Usage notes====
* The form {{m|ja||本当な}} is nonstandard. {{m|ja||本当の}} is used instead.
* Usually pronounced as {{m|ja||ほんと|tr=honto}} instead of {{m|ja||ほんとう|tr=hontō}}, especially by young ladies.
